high_descs: Turn right and walk forward to the large sofa.
Pick up the empty box from the sofa.
Move slightly forward to face the floor lamp next to the sofa.
anns.task_desc: Examine an empty box by the light of a floor lamp.

high_descs: Turn right, walk to the sofa
Grab the box on the sofa
Turn to the floor lamp by the sofa
anns.task_desc: Grab the box on the sofa, turn on the lamp by the sofa

high_descs: Turn to the right and walk to the white couch across the room.
Pick up the empty white box that is to the left of the cell phone.
Look up and to the left of the white couch.
Turn on the lamp to the left of the couch.
anns.task_desc: To use the lamp to see the box.
